name: Test
description: The base interface for tests in the TestFramework.

methods.name: id
methods.description: Returns the ID of this test.

methods.name: groups
methods.description: A list of the groups of this test. If this list is empty, the test will be only in the ungrouped group.

methods.name: enabledByDefault
methods.description: Returns if this test is enabled by default.

methods.name: onEnabled
methods.description: This method is called when this test is enabled.

methods.name: onDisabled
methods.description: This method is called when this test is disabled.

methods.name: init
methods.description: This method is called when the test is registered to a TestFramework .

methods.name: visuals
methods.description: Returns the visual information about the test.

methods.name: resolveAsStream
methods.description: Resolves all tests in this groupable element as a Stream .

methods.name: resolveAll
methods.description: Resolves all tests in this groupable element.

methods.name: asGameTest
methods.description: Returns the game test version of this test.

methods.name: listeners
methods.description: Returns the listeners of this test.
